hopobject.name: TheDeck
hopobject.pname: The Deck Penetration Testing and Forensics Platform
hopobject.body: The Deck is an Ubuntu-based penetration testing and forensics Linux distribution designed to run on the BeagleBoard-xM and BeagleBone. It has every tool you will likely need and more and is great for penetration testing on the go and for drop boxes. A complete system easily fits in a child's lunch box.
hopobject.shortdesc: The Deck is a full featured penetration testing and forensics Linux distro based on Ubuntu. It runs on the BeagleBoard-xM and BeagleBone.
